input.sentences: she brought her bag to carry her purchases .
they had left a mess abut would be back to clean it up after shopping .
when they got back they were overwhelmed because others piled their garbage too .
so they started sifting through it all .
they were able to find best things in it all . these costumes were in it all .
output.sentences: Well, Ma, we better head off to get that shopping done.
Good grief, Pa, look at that mess!
What do you supposed happened here, Ma?
I don't know, Pa, but I'm glad we weren't here when it happened!
Ok, let's watch the grandbabies and forget all about it.
